org.deeplearning4j.datasets.vectorizer

Class ImageVectorizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.datasets.vectorizer.ImageVectorizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Vectorizer

    public class ImageVectorizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Vectorizer
    An image vectorizer takes an input image (RGB) and transforms it in to a data set

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageVectorizer(java.io.File image, int numLabels, int label)
      Baseline knowledge needed for the vectorizer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImageVectorizer binarize()
      Binarize the data based on the threshold (anything < threshold is zero) This is used for making the image brightness agnostic.
      ImageVectorizer binarize(int threshold)
      Binarize the data based on the threshold (anything < threshold is zero) This is used for making the image brightness agnostic.
      ImageVectorizer normalize()
      Normalize the input image by row sums
      DataSet vectorize()
      Vectorizes the input source in to a dataset

    • Method Detail

      • binarize

        public ImageVectorizer binarize(int threshold)
        Binarize the data based on the threshold (anything < threshold is zero) This is used for making the image brightness agnostic.
        Returns:
        builder pattern

      • binarize

        public ImageVectorizer binarize()
        Binarize the data based on the threshold (anything < threshold is zero) This is used for making the image brightness agnostic. Equivalent to calling (binarze(30))
        Returns:
        builder pattern

        Normalize the input image by row sums
